skills.name: Root Snare
skills.description: Summons roots from the ground to entrap and immobilize enemies.

skills.name: Branch Smash
skills.description: A powerful strike with a massive branch, dealing significant physical damage.

skills.name: Forest's Protection
skills.description: Calls upon the forest to increase the armor of all allies.

skills.name: Nature's Wrath
skills.description: Unleashes the wrath of nature, dealing earth damage and reducing enemies' speed.

skills.name: Ancient Wisdom
skills.description: Increases the magic power of all allies.

skills.name: Regeneration
skills.description: Heals a small amount of health over time.

skills.name: Horn of Purity
skills.description: Purifies all allies, removing all debuffs.

skills.name: Healing Light
skills.description: Heals an ally for a significant amount of health.

skills.name: Blessing of the Glade
skills.description: Blesses all allies, increasing their resistances.

skills.name: Luminous Strike
skills.description: A dazzling strike with the horn, dealing light damage to an enemy.

skills.name: Nature's Grace
skills.description: Increases the healing received by all allies.

skills.name: Fairy Folk's Reverence
skills.description: Increases the magic power of all Fairy Folk allies.

skills.name: Interrogation
skills.description: Uses interrogation tools to deal damage and reveal enemy secrets.

skills.name: Enhanced Senses
skills.description: Activates enhanced sensory apparatus to increase accuracy of all allies.

skills.name: Tracker's Mark
skills.description: Marks an enemy, making them easier to track and increasing damage taken.

skills.name: Interrogate Mind
skills.description: Uses psychic interrogation to damage and confuse an enemy.

skills.name: Uncover Weakness
skills.description: Increases the critical hit chance of all allies.

skills.name: Relentless Pursuit
skills.description: Increases the speed of all allies.

skills.name: Electric Discharge
skills.description: Discharges electric energy to deal damage and potentially stun the target.

skills.name: Electromagnetic Pulse
skills.description: Releases an EMP that damages and disrupts enemy abilities.

skills.name: Static Field
skills.description: Creates a static field that increases electric resistance for all allies.

skills.name: Overload
skills.description: Overloads the target with electric energy, dealing massive damage and causing burn over time.

skills.name: Conductive Armor
skills.description: Reflects a portion of the damage back to attackers.

skills.name: Power Surge
skills.description: Increases the magic power of all allies.

skills.name: Spiked Assault
skills.description: Launches a spiked assault dealing damage and causing the target to bleed over time.

skills.name: Deathspike Barrage
skills.description: Fires a barrage of deadly spikes, weakening enemies and causing damage.

skills.name: Piercing Roar
skills.description: Unleashes a terrifying roar, dealing dark damage and instilling fear in enemies.

skills.name: Ravager's Wrath
skills.description: Unleashes a powerful attack that deals massive damage and heals itself over time.

skills.name: Dark Resilience
skills.description: Increases dark resistance for all allies.

skills.name: Spike Fortification
skills.description: Increases the armor of all allies.

skills.name: Bone Shatter
skills.description: Crushes the enemy with immense force, dealing damage and causing a broken bone debuff.

skills.name: Ground Slam
skills.description: Slams the ground, dealing damage to all enemies and potentially stunning them.

skills.name: Brute Force
skills.description: Uses brute strength to deal massive damage and weaken the target.

skills.name: Crushing Blow
skills.description: Delivers a powerful blow that deals heavy damage and heals itself.

skills.name: Thick Hide
skills.description: Increases physical resistance for all allies.

skills.name: Unyielding Strength
skills.description: Increases the strength of all allies.

skills.name: Frenzied Strike
skills.description: A powerful strike that deals heavy damage and causes the target to bleed over time.

skills.name: Ironclad Fury
skills.description: Unleashes a fury of attacks, dealing damage and healing itself over time.

skills.name: Berserk Rage
skills.description: Enters a berserk state, significantly increasing damage for a short time.

skills.name: Shield Bash
skills.description: Bashes the target with a shield, dealing damage and potentially stunning them.

skills.name: Iron Will
skills.description: Increases physical resistance for all allies.

skills.name: Enduring Strength
skills.description: Increases the strength of all allies.

skills.name: Lightning Bolt
skills.description: Hurls a bolt of lightning at the enemy, dealing electric damage and possibly stunning them.

skills.name: Thunderstorm
skills.description: Summons a thunderstorm, dealing damage to all enemies and applying a shock debuff.

skills.name: Electrify
skills.description: Electrifies all allies, increasing their electric damage for a short time.

skills.name: Storm Shield
skills.description: Creates a shield of electricity around an ally, absorbing damage and retaliating against attackers.

skills.name: Electric Mastery
skills.description: Increases electric damage for all allies.

skills.name: Stormcaller Aura
skills.description: Increases mana regeneration for all allies.

skills.name: Savage Strike
skills.description: A vicious attack that causes the target to bleed over time.

skills.name: Bloodrage
skills.description: Enters a state of bloodrage, greatly increasing damage dealt for a short time.

skills.name: Crimson Slash
skills.description: A powerful slash that leaves a deep wound, dealing damage over time.

skills.name: Warcry
skills.description: Lets out a fearsome warcry that increases the attack speed of all allies.

skills.name: Unyielding Will
skills.description: Increases physical resistance for all allies.

skills.name: Battle Hardened
skills.description: Increases the vitality of all allies.

skills.name: Seismic Slam
skills.description: Slams the ground, causing an earthquake that deals damage and stuns enemies.

skills.name: Earthquake

skills.name: Stone Skin
skills.description: Hardens the skin of an ally, greatly increasing their armor for a short time.

skills.description: Summons roots from the earth to entangle enemies, immobilizing them.

skills.name: Earthen Protection
skills.description: Increases physical resistance for all allies.

skills.name: Guardian's Resolve
skills.description: Increases the vitality of all allies.

skills.name: Flame Slash
skills.description: A fiery slash that sets the target ablaze, causing burn damage over time.

skills.name: Inferno Roar
skills.description: Lets out a terrifying roar that increases the damage of all allies for a short time.

skills.name: Blazing Shield
skills.description: Surrounds an ally with a shield of flames, absorbing damage and burning attackers.

skills.name: Firestorm
skills.description: Calls down a storm of fire, dealing damage to all enemies and applying a burn effect.

skills.name: Flame Mastery
skills.description: Increases fire damage for all allies.

skills.name: Chieftain's Fury
skills.description: Increases the attack speed of all allies.

skills.name: Bone Bash
skills.description: Bashes the target with a bone club, causing damage and stunning the target.

skills.name: Necrotic Aura
skills.description: Emits a dark aura that reduces the healing received by all enemies.

skills.name: Shield of Bones
skills.description: Raises a shield made of bones, greatly increasing the armor of an ally.

skills.name: Skeletal Grasp
skills.description: Summons skeletal hands from the ground to grasp and root an enemy.

skills.name: Bone Fortitude
skills.description: Increases physical resistance for all allies.

skills.name: Deathly Resolve
skills.description: Increases the vitality of all allies.

skills.name: Stunning Shot
skills.description: Fires an arrow that stuns the target upon impact.

skills.name: Entangling Arrow
skills.description: Shoots an arrow that entangles the target, rooting them in place.

skills.name: Charming Bolt
skills.description: Fires a magical arrow that charms the target, causing them to fight for the archer's side temporarily.

skills.name: Rain of Arrows
skills.description: Unleashes a rain of enchanted arrows that deals damage to all enemies.

skills.name: Magic Arrow
skills.description: Increases magic damage dealt by the archer.

skills.name: Elven Agility
skills.description: Increases the speed and dexterity of the archer.

skills.name: Summon Woodland Creatures
skills.description: Summons woodland creatures to aid in battle.

skills.name: Vine Grasp
skills.description: Manipulates vines to entangle and root an enemy.

skills.name: Elemental Burst
skills.description: Harnesses the power of natural elements to deal damage to an enemy.

skills.name: Healing Blossom
skills.description: Summons a healing blossom to restore health to an ally.

skills.name: Nature's Shield
skills.description: Envelops an ally in natural energies, increasing their resistances.

skills.name: Druidic Mastery
skills.description: Increases nature damage dealt by the druid.

skills.name: Illusionary Strike
skills.description: Creates an illusion to strike the target, causing confusion.

skills.name: Stealth
skills.description: Becomes invisible, avoiding enemy attacks.

skills.name: Fairy Dust Trap
skills.description: Sets a trap with fairy dust, slowing down enemies who trigger it.

skills.name: Mirror Image
skills.description: Creates mirror images to distract enemies.

skills.name: Trickster's Charm
skills.description: Charms an enemy, causing them to fight for the Pixie Trickster's side temporarily.

skills.name: Pixie Agility
skills.description: Increases the speed and evasion of the Pixie Trickster.

skills.name: Alter Appearance
skills.description: Changes the appearance of an enemy, causing confusion.

skills.name: Charm
skills.description: Casts a charm spell to manipulate an enemy's emotions, causing them to fight for the Glamour Mage's side temporarily.

skills.name: Enchant
skills.description: Casts a powerful enchantment that increases an ally's power.

skills.name: Illusory Defense
skills.description: Creates an illusion that increases an ally's defense.

skills.name: Emotion Manipulation
skills.description: Manipulates the emotions of an enemy, causing fear and reducing their effectiveness in battle.

skills.name: Glamour Mastery
skills.description: Increases the Glamour Mage's control over magic, enhancing their effectiveness.

skills.name: Summon Barrier
skills.description: Summons a protective barrier around an ally, absorbing damage.

skills.name: Healing Touch
skills.description: Heals an ally with a touch of nature's power.

skills.name: Root Grasp
skills.description: Summons roots from the ground to entangle and root an enemy.

skills.name: Ancient Strength
skills.description: Channels the strength of ancient trees to deal damage to an enemy.

skills.name: Forest's Blessing
skills.description: Blesses an ally with the power of the forest, granting regeneration over time.

skills.name: Guardian's Resilience
skills.description: Increases the armor of the Nature's Guardian, enhancing their durability.

skills.name: Blinding Light
skills.description: Emits a blinding light that blinds an enemy, reducing accuracy.

skills.name: Solar Flare
skills.description: Creates a burst of solar energy that damages all enemies.

skills.name: Daylight Blessing
skills.description: Blesses an ally with the power of daylight, increasing their damage.

skills.name: Solar Beam
skills.description: Fires a concentrated beam of solar energy that deals heavy damage to a single enemy.

skills.name: Solar Infusion
skills.description: Infuses an ally with solar energy, granting regeneration over time.

skills.name: Sunfire Mastery
skills.description: Mastery over sunfire magic increases the damage dealt by the Sunfire Sorcerer.

skills.name: Shadow Cloak
skills.description: Cloaks in shadows, becoming invisible and avoiding enemy attacks.

skills.name: Shadow Step
skills.description: Steps into the shadows and teleports to a different location on the battlefield.

skills.name: Backstab
skills.description: Launches a surprise attack from behind, dealing increased damage.

skills.name: Shadow Veil
skills.description: Shrouds in a veil of shadows, increasing evasion against enemy attacks.

skills.name: Night's Embrace
skills.description: Draws power from the shadows, increasing damage dealt.

skills.name: Shadow Mastery
skills.description: Mastery over shadow magic increases dexterity and stealth abilities.

skills.name: Inspiring Melody
skills.description: Plays an inspiring melody that increases an ally's strength.

skills.name: Charming Serenade
skills.description: Performs a charming serenade that charms an enemy, causing them to fight for the Songweaver Bard's side temporarily.

skills.name: Dissonant Discord
skills.description: Plays a discordant tune that deals damage to an enemy.

skills.name: Harmonic Barrier
skills.description: Creates a harmonic barrier that absorbs damage for an ally.

skills.name: Echoes of Healing
skills.description: Sings healing echoes that restore health to an ally.

skills.name: Melodic Mastery
skills.description: Mastery over melodies enhances magic control, increasing effectiveness.

skills.name: Celestial Prediction
skills.description: Foresees an enemy's attack, increasing dodge chance for an ally.

skills.name: Meteor Shower
skills.description: Summons a shower of meteors that damages all enemies.

skills.name: Starlight Blessing
skills.description: Bestows a blessing from starlight, increasing an ally's magic power.

skills.name: Cosmic Ray
skills.description: Fires a concentrated beam of cosmic energy that deals heavy damage to a single enemy.

skills.name: Stellar Harmony
skills.description: Channels healing energy from the stars to restore health to an ally.

skills.name: Celestial Mastery
skills.description: Mastery over celestial magic enhances magic control, improving spell effectiveness.

skills.name: Glacial Strike
skills.description: Delivers a powerful strike infused with icy cold, dealing damage to a single enemy.

skills.name: Blizzard Shield

skills.name: Icy Gale
skills.description: Summons a chilling wind that damages and slows down all enemies.

skills.name: Frostwing Glide
skills.description: Glides gracefully through the air, increasing evasion against enemy attacks.

skills.name: Frozen Fortitude
skills.description: Enhances resilience with a layer of frost, increasing armor.

skills.name: Icicle Mastery
skills.description: Mastery over ice magic increases ice damage dealt.
